document_data.title: Lost Crown of Neverwinter
document_data.author: [[Erik Scott de Bie]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Lost Crown of Neverwinter''''' is an adventure module for the [[D&D Encounters]] program in Summer 2011, for the 4th-edition of ''[[Dungeons & Dragons]]''.

{{Quote|''Missing for decades, the Crown of Neverwinter, symbol of the former ruling family, has emerged at last. Yet not all are pleased with the crown's reappearance. Beset by [[Sons of Alagondar|rebels]] and [[Spellplague|plaguechanged]], [[Dagult Neverember|Lord Dagult Neverember]] must hire a group of adventurers to track down the so-called Lost Heir and discover his intentions for the city. The stakes are no less than the lives of the citizens of Neverwinter, for if the heroes fail, [[Neverwinter]] seems doomed to descend into civil war.''

''Lost Crown of Neverwinter is a [[Dungeons & Dragons]] adventure designed for the summer 2011 season of the [[D&D Encounters]] official play program. The adventure includes three full-color battle maps, fourteen ready-to-play encounters, and information on the program.''}}
